text:
William Morgan Sheppard (24 August 1932 – 6 January 2019) also known as Morgan Sheppard or W. Morgan Sheppard, was an English actor. He was born in London. He studied at the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art. Sheppard was known for his roles in "Star Trek", "Max Headroom" and in "Gods and Generals".
Sheppard died on 6 January 2019 at his home in Los Angeles, California from cancer, aged 86.
